questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' separation and subsequent two-year hiatus, as well as the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas. What is...?
Taking place in a mysterious forest, involving the rescue of Sanji and a confrontation with Big Mom. What is...?
This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates participating in a gladiator-style tournament on an island ruled by a Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This technique, utilized by Sanji, sets his leg on fire, enhancing the power of his kicks. What is...?
This technique, used by Zoro, involves the use of three swords at once, including one in the mouth. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This lesser-known member of the Revolutionary Army is recognized for his ability to create powerful winds and for being the second-in-command to Monkey D. Dragon. Who is...?
This character, known for their skeletal appearance and musical talents, is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates. Who is...?
This character, a key figure in the Wano Country arc, possesses the mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, Model: Nine-Tailed Fox. Who is...?
